MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline, affecting properties in Golfdrum Streets and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:47am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:15 PM on Monday, 11 January 2021.
